outputs.output_descr: The project will contribute to the improvement of consumer protection of animal food products. It will support the harmonization and modernization of the national livestock databases to improve the traceability and safety of livestock products. A value chain for lamb meat will be developed according to the EU principles of quality and food safety  "from farm to fork". The project will work with voluntary formed farmers associations and will introduce to breeders the concept of environmental control of pastures.

project_descr: Improving the Performance of Livestock Sector in Albania
project_title: Improving the Performance of Livestock Sector in Albania
